Description.Name: Wherethafuqawe. . .
Description.Details: Sitting in your command chair, you can feel the even rhythm coming from the jumpships Kearny-Fuchida drive that the Argo is docked to as it charges in preparation for jump. That rhythm soon takes on an erractic pulse, with vibrations and shudders groaning throughout the Argo, You look over to Darius, "STATUS REPORT!" Darius, busy at the terminal calls out, "Commander, it appears something is malfunctioning on the jumpship. Their Captain reports engineering is working on it, but they do not know the reason or source at this time!" Sumire gets your attention, "Commander, it appears the Kerby-Fucheatah Console is sending data to the jumpship." You look over to her, "What? I thought it only sent data the one time to the jumpship. You mean to tell me it is doing something more than that?" Sumire punches buttons on the console, "I believe so, Commander." You jump out of your command chair and rush over to the console. The data displayed makes no real sense to you. You look at Sumire, "Well, you're the navigator, how do we stop this?" Sumire's hands run over the keyboard, pressing various buttons before she looks at you, "I do not think we can stop this, Commander. When I try to deactivate the console, it displays a timer for shutdown, but the next jump will have occured by the time it actually shuts off. What should we do Commander?"

Description.Name: Deactivate that damned KF Console!
Description.Details: Turn off the Kerby-Fucheatah Console.

Description.Name: ...Jump...Jump Around!
Description.Details: You look at Sumire, "Find a way to turn that damned console off!" Sumire quickly flicks a couple switches and the console dims and shuts down, "Commander, the Console is set to shutdown. The jump clock shows our ride will be jumping us out in 3... 2... 1..." Moments later, the jumpship's KF Drive activates and that quesy feeling when jumping through space washes over your body. As your vision returns post jump, Darius calls out, "The Captain of the jumpship is furious and is going to file a report with the Mercenary Review Board and the Commercial JumpShip Travel Authority as soon as they finish their shipwide diagnostics and damage assessment." You look out the viewport, seeing a totally different system than the one you expected, "Where the F..." Sumire interupts your outburst, "Commander, it appears we are now in the [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] system, which is over 170 light years away from the closest known civilised system of New Gascony! All stations are reporting operational as well, so we do not appear to have suffered any noticable damage from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMisjump],misjump]]. You look at Sumire and Dr Murad, both of whom wanted the Console installed, "My head hurts from all of this." You turn to Darius, "Plot a path back to civilisation. I'll be in my office. "

Description.Name: ...Jump...Jump Around! Minor
Description.Details: You look at Sumire, "Find a way to turn that damned console off!" Sumire quickly flicks a couple switches and the console dims and shuts down, "Commander, the Console is set to shutdown. The jump clock shows our ride will be jumping us out in 3... 2... 1..." Moments later, the jumpship's KF Drive activates and that quesy feeling when jumping through space washes over your body. "Report," you yell as your vision returns post jump and you turn to see the Console smoking. Sumire and an astech are dousing it with an extinguisher. After the smoke clears, Sumire examines the Console, "Commander, the Console is offline and some of the components have been destroyed. Engineering reports no obvious damage to any other systems or structure of the Argo." Darius moves over to the sensor station, "Commander, we appear to be in the [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] system, which is over 170 light years away from the closest known civilised system of New Gascony! We have a message from the Captain of the jumpship. Their astechs have traced the power flux back to the Argo and will be filing reports to the Mercenary Review Board and the Commercial JumpShip Travel Authority as soon as they finish their shipwide diagnostics and damage assessment." The KF Console is damaged and offline until repairs can be made.

"Report," you yell as your vision returns post jump and you turn to see the Console smoking. Sumire and an astech are dousing it with an extinguisher. After the smoke clears, Sumire examines the Console, "Commander, the Console is offline and some of the components have been destroyed. Engineering reports major damage to the engine and structure of the Argo." Darius moves over to the sensor station, "Commander, we appear to be in the [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] system, which is over 810 light years away from the closest known civilised system of Ksabi! We have a message from the Captain of the jumpship. Their astechs have traced the power flux back to the Argo and will be filing reports to the Mercenary Review Board and the Commercial JumpShip Travel Authority as soon as they finish their shipwide diagnostics and damage assessment." The KF Console is damaged and offline. Travel times are increased until repairs can be made to the console and engines.

The KF Console is damaged and offline. Travel times are increased until repairs can be made to the console and engines.

Description.Name: ...Jump...Jump Around!
Description.Details: You look at Sumire, "Find a way to turn that damned console off!" Sumire quickly flicks a couple switches and the console dims and shuts down, "Commander, the Console is set to shutdown. The jump clock shows our ride will be jumping us out in 3... 2... 1..." Moments later, the jumpship's KF Drive activates and that quesy feeling when jumping through space washes over your body. As your vision returns post jump, Darius grabs your attention, "Commander, the astechs on the jumpship have traced the power flux to the Argo. The Captain of the jumpship is furious and is going to file a report with the Mercenary Review Board and the Commercial JumpShip Travel Authority as soon as they finish their shipwide diagnostics and damage assessment." Ignoring him for the moment, you look out the viewport, seeing a totally different system than the one you expected, "Where the Fu..." Sumire interupts your outburst, "Commander, it appears we have misjumped and are now in the [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] system. All stations are reporting operational as well, so we did not suffer any damage from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMisjump],misjump]].

After the smoke clears, Sumire examines the Console, "Commander, the Console is offline and some of the components have been destroyed. Engineering reports extensive damage to the engine and structure of the Argo." Darius moves over to the sensor station, "Commander, we appear to be in the [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] system, which is over 110 light years away from the closest known civilised system of Marius's Tears! We have a message from the Captain of the jumpship. Their astechs have traced the power flux back to the Argo and will be filing reports to the Mercenary Review Board and the Commercial JumpShip Travel Authority as soon as they finish their shipwide diagnostics and damage assessment." The KF Console is damaged and offline. Travel times are increased until repairs can be made to the console and engines.
